verbs.description: Trump tweets that top economic adviser Larry Kudlow [V: has] suffered a heart attack , is at Walter Reed medical center .
Trump tweets that [ARG0: top economic adviser Larry Kudlow] has [V: suffered] [ARG1: a heart attack] , is at Walter Reed medical center .
Trump tweets that [ARG1: top economic adviser Larry Kudlow] has suffered a heart attack , [V: is] [ARG2: at Walter Reed medical center] .
